categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vel was a male Moff of the Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. After a prototype Imperial starship was accidentally scrapped on the junk moons of Axxila, Vel hired scavengers to recover the starship, and launched an investigation afterwards.

Vel was first mentioned in the Scavenging crew skill mission "Throwing Out Diamonds" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. With Game Update 4.1, the mission was made available to both factions, and Vel was referred to as faction-ambiguous "Admiral Vel."
